name: Find The Sunbed
description:
Find The Sunbed

Find The Sunbed is an arcade game focused on overcoming many inhuman obstacles in single player mode. Will you get carried away and embark on a challenging, epic and unique challenge? Discover the limits of your own nervous endurance? If so, this game is perfect for you. Let yourself be carried away into a whirlwind of unique experiences, take additional lessons from keyboard boxing and give it your best! Unusual obstacles and difficulties requiring inhuman skills await you. Are you ready to prove your worth? Play and show everyone who is the real alpha male.


Main features:

A unique obstacle course

Test your skills on a unique obstacle course with self-designed elements and obstacles.

Check and improve your dexterity

Play and see how high your dexterity skills are while negotiating obstacles such as spiral or
gossip. With each subsequent attempt, you will deepen your knowledge of both the game itself and you will gain more dexterity skills

No entries

The complete absence of in-game saves will allow you to deepen your gameplay experience.

Unique Ending

When playing Find The Sunbed, you will be able to see a unique ending that was only seen by
small group of people. Maybe you too will be one of those few people?

In the future:

Extensive level editor

In the future you will also be able to expect an extensive editor integrated with the game thanks to which you will be able to
create social maps and thus develop the content that can be played by another player

More characters

In the near future you will also be able to expect more content from the range of playable characters such as anime characters or female and male characters.
It is up to you in the future to decide what you want to see in the game

Many new obstacles

Over time, you will also be able to see new levels for the main game and thus new obstacles and new experiences from the single-player game

An extensive soundtrack

We also plan to add an extensive soundtrack to the game to make the game experience more complete and expressive
